{{cpp/types/type_index/title|name}}
{{cpp/types/type_index/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 |
const char* name() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the name of the associated {{lc|std::type_info}} object. Equivalent to calling {{lc|std::type_info::name()}} directly.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The name of the associated {{lc|std::type_info}} object.

===Example===
{{example
| code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;typeindex&gt;
int main() {
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::type_index(typeid(std::cout)).name();
}
| p=true | output=NSt3__113basic_ostreamIcNS_11char_traitsIcEEEE
}}
